cause.description:
The Peak Performance Lifestyles Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to empowering teenagers with the tools to become leaders and to contribute to their communities. Through workshops, personal coaching sessions, and social action and contribution events teenagers are given opportunities to implement their newfound skills.
1. Developing Today's Youth into Tomorrow's Leaders
cause.mission: promote social responsibility and leadership amongst todays youth
cause.name: Peak Performance Lifestyles Foundation
